name: Treads On Fire
description:
This is a 3D racing game in which you race in self-assembled cars on tracks on the surfaces of alien planets. The player's task is to win races to earn money to upgrade and repair owned cars. These races are focused on a demolition with a large number of collisions and explosions, the driving model is fully based on physics.

Race modes available:

  • Classic race - the winner is the one who reaches the finish line first, covering all the laps
  • Race against time - the winner is the one who achieves the shortest possible driving time for a single lap
  • Elimination - rules as in a regular race with the addition of one new rule, such that the last rider on a given lap is out of the race (explodes)

The game is currently demo size. Controls can be changed in the game menu (not in the launcher). The sound effects used to create the game come from the following websites: http://soundbible.com/, http://www.pacdv.com/sounds/
